text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
——RAAAAAAAAAAAAH! 
FULL! SPEED! AHEAD!!!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(…Light O's fast, all right…! 
They say her top speed is 75kmh, and I can believe it——)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wait, no, hang on! 
Light O, why'd you suddenly——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: You're too slow too slow way too slow! Too slow to figure things out and your running too!! An american bogsucker would be better at this!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Is this all you've got, Kei-chan!? 
You're supposed to be the miracle Umamusume repaying your saviors!! Aren't you!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
We're not done yet! 
GO! STRAIGHT! AHEAD! 
TOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Good grief…! You didn't even set a finish line, all you did was run until Light O-san's stamina gave out…!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Bwuh… Huff… But… Cough! Hack! Wheeze… wheeze… 
T-thanks to that… w—— Aghhack!! …WHEEEZE…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Don't force yourself, Light O! 
Let's just calm down for a sec…!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Phew, I am calmed down now so let's pick up where we left off. 
First things first thank you for running with me Kei-chan.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: O-oh, it's no problem… But could you please explain why you suddenly started running with me, Light O?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Because I wanted to understand again. 
And I did. 
Kei-chan. …You are fast. Very. Fast.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: To be honest it was to the point that I was thinking "what the heck is her problem why is she so fast". Your speed is nothing short of miraculous.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
! 
Light O…

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: BUT WHEN IT COMES TO TALKING YOU'RE SLOW AS A SNAIL!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: …………What?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Why. I don't get it at all. Why do you keep saying "It's okay don't worry about me"? What's okay? Nothing. Nothing's okay about it. Not at all.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Kei-chan you were the one who made it so we could sing. 
You were so nice it was actually kind of weird but you took good care of all of us one by one.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: It's thanks to your kind encouragement that we went up on stage and sang perfectly. Okay to be honest I messed up the lyrics seven times but even then you were there to cover for me.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: And as a bonus you're really fast. ——So what's the problem. Why don't you want to go on a trip with us. Why did you reject our invitation.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: It doesn't make any sense to me at all!!!!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Light O… 
But, listen, I——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: It doesn't make any sense to me at all!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Heavens… That's quite enough, calm down, Light O-san!! 
Can't you tell you're causing Miracle-san trouble? 
…I am so very sorry.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh… Umm, no… It's okay, Durandal. 
I, um… I'm glad you guys invited me. It really means a lot.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
But I'm… I'm the one who ruined the fun for everyone else… 
You wouldn't want someone like that to get in the way——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: No. On that point, I must also say it doesn't make any sense to me at all.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
……Wait… 
What……?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps we have a bit of a misunderstanding here… 
But I agree wholeheartedly with every one of Light O-san's grievances. In fact——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Considering everything we've heard so far, it does not seem you object to the idea of the vacation itself.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
And we want for you to join us. 
…So what reason, pray tell, do you have to protest?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Okay time's up this is taking too long. We're just going to take her by force. Durandal. Time for Operation: Gang Up On Her Two-Against-One.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: I would never stoop so low as to "gang up" on her!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
No, we shall name this operation—— 
[ Enlightenment of Twin Blinding Blades : 
CROSS BREAK IGNITION ]!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ah- wait… 
You ARE ganging up on me…!?
